{"id":1215917802,"question_id":724,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"8 months, 1 week","timestamp":1711590579,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"15 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1215917802/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"34.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int pivotIndex(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int N = (int)nums.size();\n        vector<int> pref(N+1);\n\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            pref[i+1] = pref[i] + nums[i];\n        }\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            if (pref[i] == pref[N] - pref[i + 1]) {\n                return i;\n            }\n        }\n\n        return -1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
